name: Woodland Community College
description: The Woodland app brings services to your fingertips and enables you to connect with your classmates and friends. You can access events, calendars, contacts, maps, and more! Stay organized with the timetable function, where you can save events, classes, and assignments. Join your campus community on the Woodland app now!   Features to help you with your student life  + Classes - Manage your classes, create to-dos & reminders, and stay on top of assignments.  + Events - Find what events are happening on campus.  + Tour - Explore and get to know your campus  + Deals - Access exclusive discounts  + Campus Services - Learn about what services are offered  + Groups & Clubs - Find out about clubs on campus and how to get involved  + Campus Feed - Join the campus discussion.  + Campus Map - Get directions to classes, events and departments  + Students List - Communicate with fellow students
